original_text: We thought that your brother was dead. But now he has returned to us alive. We thought that he had left us for all time. But now he has come home. So we must all be happy together.” ’
korean_text: 이 네 동생은 죽었다가 살아났으며 내가 잃었다가 얻었기로 우리가 즐거워하고 기뻐하는 것이 마땅하다 하니라

sentences.original_text: We thought that your brother was dead.
But now he has returned to us alive.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이제 그가 살아 우리에게 돌아왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: We thought that he had left us for all time.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그가 영원히 우리를 떠났다고 생각했습니다.

sentences.original_text: But now he has come home.
So we must all be happy together.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 우리 모두 함께 기뻐해야 합니다.
